description.displayText: Nancy is amazing!  She has watched  my multiple children on many occasions and they love her!  Just today with the snow we received, we asked her to come help us with outdoor activities with the kids.  We built a snowman with her and she was fantastic help with sledding!  She even saved my 3 year olds life when he almost ended up in the pond!  She dove after him and snatched him right before he hit the edge of the pond!  She herself wound up getting wet from the water but was fantastic with him!!  I wouldn't trust anyone else to watch my children! She feels like a part of the family and my kids love her.  You couldn't ask for anyone better!

description.displayText: Nancy is a very loving, caring and wonderful woman!! She is punctual, dependable and fabulous with the kids!! I highly recommend her, she would be an asset to any family.
description.originalText: Nancy is a very loving, caring and wonderful woman!! She is punctual, dependable and fabulous with the kids!! I highly recommend her, she would be an asset to any family.

description.displayText: Nancy is the kindest person I know!  She is highly organized and professional, but she knows how to have fun and keep children creatively engaged.  She is prompt and extremely reliable. I can always count on her. Children LOVE her (and parents do too!). I highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Nancy is the kindest person I know!  She is highly organized and professional, but she knows how to have fun and keep children creatively engaged.  She is prompt and extremely reliable. I can always count on her. Children LOVE her (and parents do too!). I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Nancy is fantastic!  She was amazing with my 2 children, my son is 3 and my daughter is 5.   She is very hands on and loves to interact with them by doing both crafts and activities.  She was patient as they were learning new tasks and skills and I felt she was very encouraging when they became frustrated if they couldn't get it at first. The kids love being with her and she seems to be genuinely happy to spend time with them and teach them new things.
